content:
i want you to include the financial budget excel sheet plus" Tasks Phase 1 (Month 1) Phase 2 (Month 2-3) Phase 3 (Month 4-6) Phase 4 (Month 7-8) Phase 5 (Month 9-12)
Define marketing objectives and target audience X 
Conduct market research to identify competitive landscape and audience preferences X 
Develop key messaging and creative concepts X 
Establish marketing budget and allocate resources X 
Develop content for marketing channels X 
Create marketing materials X 
Select marketing channels based on audience research and budget X 
Set up tracking mechanisms to measure the effectiveness of each channel X 
Launch the marketing campaign across selected channels X 
Monitor and optimize the campaign based on initial results X 
Leverage industry partnerships to promote the institute and increase awareness among potential students X 
Attend relevant industry events and participate in speaking opportunities X 
Follow up with leads generated from the marketing campaign X 
Provide personalized support to potential students throughout the enrollment process X 
Host campus visits and informational sessions for interested students and parents X 
Implement conversion optimization tactics, such as retargeting ads and email drip campaigns X 
Analyze the results of the marketing campaign and refine the approach based on insights to improve future campaigns X
Evaluate the effectiveness of each marketing channel and adjust the budget allocation for the next year X
Conduct surveys and gather feedback from enrolled students to improve the overall student experience X and share the final version" and share
